item.description:
Do you believe in Conspiracies?
Do you think that the Dinosaur media is not telling
Us what is really going on?
Do you wonder what our Government & Other
Organizations are not telling us?

Do you believe in the Paranormal?
Have you seen Ghosts?
Have you seen a UFO?
Do you believe in the urban legends?

Look at the Mysteries of this Unknown World.

Come to our Meet Up on Sunday,
November 25 at 7:00

Village Inn Restaurant & Diner
699 Main Street
East Haven, Conn. 06512
(203) 469 5759

www.nearhome.com/needfoodnow/ct/eastshore/villiageinn/index.htm

Go to the link for a map and other information
For The Village Inn Diner.

It is next door to the McDonalds on Main Street.

Agenda:
Are Unknown Zone Members invited to
CT Paranormal Holidays event in early Dec?

Do Unknown Zone Members want to attend Coffee and a
Movie with Coffee Talk at noon on Dec. 9 at
Ct. Post Mall.

Can Coffee Talk Members attend some of the
Unknown Zone lectures/Presentation.
Core Coffee Talk only - the real RSVP Yes.

Can there be an Unknown Zone Holiday shopping
Or something else, besides party, Meet Up.

SGRA will have Dec. Work Shops, those might be
Meet Ups depending on when and where.

Book of the Month starting in January.

Drew giving a lecture either late afternoon or
early evening on January 27.
Is that Date okay?
Like, is it the Super Bowl or something?
What can he talk to us about?
His weblink is found else where.

What are we doing in January?
A Coffee Talk or SGRA could be our public event.
Early to mid December we can think up a private event.

Will try to line up speakers for later in early 2008.

I hope to get the photo CDs organized to give to
Christine before I leave home.
Drew and Diane saw the orb photos yesterday in
Fairfeld. They let me know what copies that they want/

Maybes were allowed up to Nov 25.
Maybes are closed.
Then they have been changed to No.

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: East Haven Village Inn Diner UZ Get Together
